entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread on nullable sources #74624
  • Go to definitiion not working. #74621
  • Collection expressions use `AddRange` instead of manual `foreach` in presence of a struct enumerator #74615
  • Code issues #74614
  • XML documentation cref to method with nullable array parameter should not produce warnings CS1584 and CS1658 #74613
  • No warning on use of static variable before initialization #74612

Closed

  • Multiple compiler servers running (and consuming CPU) on Linux #74607
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35130.81 #74611

PullRequests

Created

  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Tag PRs where any file matches the specified patterns #74622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolKey.ResolveString #74618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce overhead for resolving SymbolKey special types #74617
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractStructureTaggerProvider.GetMultiLineRegions #74619
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move existing RemoveWhere code into an extension method on ArrayBuilder #74620
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move 'use auto prop' check earlier #74616
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations during SourceText serialization #74608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change SyntaxEquivalence.AreEquivalent to use a more appropriate pooling mechanism for the stack it uses to walk trees. #74610
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce Roslyn packages impact on UI thread #74501
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
